name: makeup-keyboard-trap
description: Restricts keyboard tabindex to a single subtree in the DOM
author: Ian McBurnie <ianmcburnie@hotmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server" "npm run watch"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run transpile:module
scripts.build: npm run transpile:module && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: npm run transpile:docs && npm run bundle:docs
scripts.lint: eslint src/index.js > lint.txt && eslint docs/src/index.js > lint.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:tests
scripts.server: browser-sync start -s --ss docs --index docs/index.html --files docs/index.html docs/bundled/docs.min.js
scripts.watch: onchange src/index.js docs/src/index.js -- npm run build
scripts.version: npm run prepublishOnly && git add -A docs/bundled
